titles.en: Chapter 128 – Limit of the walking during the Tawaaf
Chapter 128 – Limit of the walking during the Tawaaf

verses.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنِ الْبَرْقِيِّ عَنْ عَبْدِ الرَّحْمَنِ بْنِ سَيَابَةَ قَالَ سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنِ الطَّوَافِ فَقُلْتُ أُسْرِعُ وَ أُكْثِرُ أَوْ أُبْطِئُ قَالَ مَشْيٌ بَيْنَ الْمَشْيَيْنِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text: A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Isa, from Al Barqy, from Abdul Rahman Bin Sayaba who said, ‘I asked Abu Abdullahasws about the Tawaaf, so I said, ‘Quickly, or mostly (quickly), or slowly?’ Heasws said:’ Walk between the two walks (moderate pace)’.
